thread.title_full: DR Golf Travel Exchange 2015 aims to promote Dominican Republic’s golf tourismTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: DR Golf Travel Exchange 2015 aims to promote Dominican Republic’s golf tourismTravelandtourworld.com
text:
DR Golf Travel Exchange 2015 aims to promote Dominican Republic’s golf tourism Published on : Tuesday, September 8, 2015
Aiming to promote Dominican Republic’s golf tourism, the 2nd annual DR Golf Travel Exchange 2015 was opened on Saturday night. The DR Golf Travel Exchange is a venue that aims to showcase some of the country´s most breathtaking links located in La Romana and Punta Cana (east).
During the launch TARGET Consultores de Mercadeo executive director Teddy De Lara revealed that golf travel to the Caribbean nation jumped 40% last year.
More than 85 specialized golf events tour operators from several continents, as well as coverage by local and foreign specialized media from 25 countries were present at the inaugural cocktail at Casa de Campo Resort, hoisted by Casa de Campo president Rafael Torres.
The DR Golf Travel Exchange includes a seminar, a workshop, business meetings between travel agents and international tour operators, as with Dominican hotel managers, golf courses directors, and with receptive tourism operators.
The goal of DR Golf Travel Exchange 2015 is to consolidate golf tourism in the Dominican Republic, said De Lara.
Torres said the event showcases the country´s world class golf courses including “Teeth of the Dog” designed by Pete Dye, “and which has been classified as the No. 1 Golf Course in Latin America by Golf Magazine.”
The activities of the DR Golf Travel Exchange 2015 includes a tournament at Casa de Campo´s famed Teeth of the Dog links with two additional rounds, one at Bavaro´s Cocotal Golf Club, and another at Punta Espada at Cap Cana, for participants to experience the unrivaled Dominican courses.
